title: mount: implement set timestamp
body:
I'm using rclone v1.35-DEV (latest version from GitHub) on macOS 10.12.2 x64 with Google Drive.

```
$ echo test > testfile
$ touch -m -t '200001010101' testfile
$ stat testfile
  File: testfile
  Size: 5         	Blocks: 8          IO Block: 4096   regular file
Device: 1000001h/16777217d	Inode: 9003334     Links: 1
Access: (0644/-rw-r--r--)  Uid: (  501/ michael)   Gid: (   20/   staff)
Access: 2017-03-02 16:06:39.000000000 +0100
Modify: 2000-01-01 01:01:00.000000000 +0100
Change: 2017-03-02 16:06:55.000000000 +0100
 Birth: 2000-01-01 01:01:00.000000000 +0100
$ mv testfile test/
$ stat test/testfile
  File: test/testfile
  Size: 5         	Blocks: 8          IO Block: 16777216 regular file
Device: 34000016h/872415254d	Inode: 13865853971301637238  Links: 1
Access: (0644/-rw-r--r--)  Uid: (  501/ michael)   Gid: (   20/   staff)
Access: 2017-03-02 16:07:03.576000000 +0100
Modify: 2017-03-02 16:07:03.576000000 +0100
Change: 2017-03-02 16:07:03.576000000 +0100
 Birth: 2017-03-02 16:07:03.576000000 +0100
```

```
$ cat .rclone.conf
[google]
type = drive
client_id =
client_secret =
token = {"access_token":"xxx","token_type":"Bearer","refresh_token":"xxx","expiry":"2017-03-02T16:54:51.727004973+01:00"}
$ ~/go/bin/rclone mount -vv google: ~/test
2017/03/02 16:06:29 DEBUG : rclone: Version "v1.35-DEV" starting with parameters ["/Users/michael/go/bin/rclone" "mount" "-vv" "google:" "/Users/michael/test"]
2017/03/02 16:06:30 INFO  : Google drive root '': Modify window is 1ms
2017/03/02 16:06:30 DEBUG : Google drive root '': Mounting on "/Users/michael/test"
2017/03/02 16:06:30 DEBUG : Google drive root '': Root()
2017/03/02 16:06:30 DEBUG : : Dir.Attr valid=1m0s ino=0 size=0 mode=drwxr-xr-x
2017/03/02 16:06:30 DEBUG : : Dir.Attr valid=1m0s ino=0 size=0 mode=drwxr-xr-x
2017/03/02 16:06:39 DEBUG : : Dir.Attr valid=1m0s ino=0 size=0 mode=drwxr-xr-x
2017/03/02 16:07:02 DEBUG : testfile: Dir.Lookup
2017/03/02 16:07:02 DEBUG : : Reading directory
2017/03/02 16:07:02 DEBUG : Google drive root '': Reading ""
2017/03/02 16:07:02 DEBUG : Google drive root '': Finished reading ""
2017/03/02 16:07:02 DEBUG : testfile: Dir.Lookup OK
2017/03/02 16:07:02 DEBUG : testfile: File.Attr valid=1m0s ino=0 size=5 mode=-rw-r--r--
2017/03/02 16:07:02 DEBUG : testfile: Dir.Remove
2017/03/02 16:07:03 DEBUG : testfile: Dir.Remove OK
2017/03/02 16:07:03 DEBUG : testfile: Dir.Lookup
2017/03/02 16:07:03 DEBUG : : Dir.Attr valid=1m0s ino=0 size=0 mode=drwxr-xr-x
2017/03/02 16:07:03 DEBUG : testfile: Dir.Create
2017/03/02 16:07:03 DEBUG : testfile: Dir.Create OK
2017/03/02 16:07:03 DEBUG : File.Attr valid=1m0s ino=0 size=0 mode=-rw-r--r--
2017/03/02 16:07:03 DEBUG : testfile: WriteFileHandle.Write len=5
2017/03/02 16:07:03 DEBUG : : Dir.Attr valid=1m0s ino=0 size=0 mode=drwxr-xr-x
2017/03/02 16:07:03 DEBUG : .hidden: Dir.Lookup
2017/03/02 16:07:03 DEBUG : testfile: WriteFileHandle.Write OK (5 bytes written)
2017/03/02 16:07:03 DEBUG : File.Attr valid=1m0s ino=0 size=5 mode=-rw-r--r--
2017/03/02 16:07:03 DEBUG : File.Attr valid=1m0s ino=0 size=5 mode=-rw-r--r--
2017/03/02 16:07:03 DEBUG : File.Attr valid=1m0s ino=0 size=5 mode=-rw-r--r--
2017/03/02 16:07:03 DEBUG : testfile: WriteFileHandle.Flush
2017/03/02 16:07:04 DEBUG : testfile: WriteFileHandle.Flush OK
2017/03/02 16:07:04 DEBUG : testfile: WriteFileHandle.Release nothing to do
2017/03/02 16:07:04 DEBUG : testfile: File.Attr valid=1m0s ino=0 size=5 mode=-rw-r--r--
```
